content: {"name": "Latter Rain Church of Jesus Christ Apostolic Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Text (404) 399-8232 to confirm if there's food available.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/ebwoo2009?locale=bs_BA", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4633 Covington Highway", "address_2": null, "city": "Decatur", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30035", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7425936, "longitude": -84.2197539}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 399-8232", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Contact in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
